title: Can't connect to the client
body: I can't connect to the client, I don't understand why either. My google chrome works, internet is fine.  I just can't connect to the league client. I tried restarting my computer but nothing happened. I restarted my modem and nothing happened. Please respond soon, this is really inconvenient..

replies.body: I can log on, I just keep dcing on the client screen. Can't view profile or chat with anyone else. I get a DC every 10-15 seconds..

Hey Buddar

Thanks for adding the extra info - How long has this been happening for?

First up, if you haven't, I'd suggest you check out our article on [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and see if any of the steps there help in any way.

Cheers
Mindstar
